did.unittitle: Washtenaw County Metropolitan Planning Commission publications 1948-1980
did.abstract: Various publications of the Washtenaw County Metropolitan Planning Commission, also includes publications of the predecessor organization Washtenaw County Planning Commission.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The Washtenaw County Metropolitan Planning Commission publications were received as individual items or a parts of several accessions.

accessrestrict.p: The publications are open without restriction.

userestrict.p: Copyright status is unclear. It may be held by the authors or creating agency.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Washtenaw County Metropolitan Planning Commission publications, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

scopecontent.p: Various publications of the Washtenaw County Metropolitan Planning Commission, also includes publications of the predecessor organization Washtenaw County Planning Commission.
